snippet: The nuns, who had vanished from the ancient Aramaic-speaking town of Maaloula, said they had left with rebels to escape shelling.
lead_paragraph: The nuns, who had vanished from the ancient Aramaic-speaking town of Maaloula, said they had left with rebels to escape shelling.

headline.main: Nuns, Missing in Syria, Resurface in Video
